Kralj prebave
Kaki je bogat s C-vitaminom, od mineralov je v njem veliko kalija, ki je pomemben za zdravje srca, koristil naj bi tudi pri hemoroidih in težavah z želodcem.
05 Nov 2019, 14:25 by U. S.



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOFOTO: Guliver/Getty Images



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOLjudsko zdravilstvo kaki priporoča pri težavah s črevesjem in želodcem. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images


Kaki blagodejno vpliva na naše zdravje, je rumene, oranžne ali rdečkaste barve, po obliki spominja na paradižnik. Prihaja iz Kitajske, kjer ga gojijo že dva tisoč let, in Japonske, raste tudi pri nas.Je posebnega vonja, videza in sladkastega, medenega okusa, vsebuje sladkor, zlasti glukozo in fruktozo, precej prehranskih vlaknin, več antioksidantov, vitamine C, B2, B9, A, betakaroten, pa E in K, od mineralov pa kalcij, kalij, mangan, baker, fosfor.V ljudskem zdravilstvu je cenjen sadež, svežega ali pa njegov sok priporočajo pri težavah s črevesjem – pri (kroničnem) zaprtju, tudi pri hemoroidih (preprečuje trdo blato), v primeru slabe prebave in težav z želodcem ter gastroenteritisom. Mimogrede: kuhan sadež koristi v primeru diareje.Kaki naj bi po prepričanju tradicionalne kitajske medicine uravnotežal energijo, priporoča se kot energijsko bogato živilo pri oslabljenem organizmu, ker vsebuje dosti sladkorja, ki daje energijo, se priporoča tudi pri fizični aktivnosti. Priporoča se slabokrvnim, ljudem z zamaščenimi jetri ali slabim delovanjem tega pomembnega organa, tudi pri težavah s suhim kašljem pomaga.


FOTO: Guliver/Getty ImagesGETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTO

Ker vsebuje antioksidante, varuje organizem pred posledicami oksidativnega stresa, obenem antioksidanti krepijo odpornost telesa, ki se tako lažje brani pred boleznimi, k večji odpornosti pripomore tudi C-vitamin. Kaki je vir vitamina A, ki je pomemben za zdrav vid, vsebuje tudi lutein in zeaksantin, ki prav tako pomagata preprečevati bolezni oči. Pomaga v boju proti boleznim srca in ožilja, nižal naj bi visoki krvni tlak. Pomirjujoče vpliva na živce, jih sprošča in krepi. Svoj prostor je našel tudi v kozmetiki, uporaba je lahka: z žličko izdolbemo sočno meso in zmešamo ter kot masko nanesemo na očiščeno kožo obraza in vratu. Po petnajstih minutah speremo z mlačno vodo.
Pazimo, da je sadež zares zrel, le tak ima sladek okus.
Najboljši so sveži, kakije lahko uživamo tudi posušene, taki so zlasti dobrodošli pozimi. Vsebuje precej tanina, zaradi česar je lahko trpkega okusa, ta pa se izgubi, ko je sadež povsem zrel. Super je, da pri gojenju škropiv praktično ne uporabljajo. Zdaj je njihova sezona, prav zdaj zorijo, zato si jih le privoščite.

The king of digestion
Kaki is rich in C-vitamins and contains a lot of potassium, which is important for heart health, and is also useful for hemorrhoids and stomach problems.
05 Nov 2019, 14:25 by U. S.



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTOPhoto: Gulliver / Getty Images



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTHuman medicine recommends khaki for gut and stomach problems. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images


What has a beneficial effect on our health is yellow, orange or reddish in color, reminiscent of tomatoes. It comes from China, where it has been grown for two thousand years, and Japan, it grows in us too. It has a special smell, appearance and sweet, honey taste, contains sugar, especially glucose and fructose, a lot of dietary fiber, more antioxidants, vitamins C, B2 , B9, A, beta-carotene, E and K, and from minerals calcium, potassium, manganese, copper, phosphorus. In medicine, fruit, fresh or its juice is recommended for intestinal problems - in (chronic) constipation, also for hemorrhoids (prevents stool), in case of indigestion and stomach problems and gastroenteritis. By the way: cooked fruits benefit in the case of diarrhea.Which, according to traditional Chinese medicine, balances energy, it is recommended as an energy-rich food in a weakened organism, since it contains a lot of sugar that gives energy, it is also recommended in physical activity. It is recommended for anemia, people with fatty liver, or poor functioning of this important organ, even with dry cough problems.


PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty ImagesGETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTO

Because it contains antioxidants, it protects the body from the effects of oxidative stress, while at the same time, antioxidants enhance the body's resistance to diseases, thus helping to increase resistance to C-vitamin. Kaki, a source of vitamin A that is important for healthy vision, also contains lutein and zeaxanthin, which also help prevent eye disease. It helps to fight cardiovascular diseases and is supposed to lower high blood pressure. It calms the nerves, relaxes and strengthens them. He also found his place in cosmetics, the use is easy: with a teaspoon, he chopped up the juicy meat and mixed it and applied it as a mask to the cleansed skin of his face and neck. After fifteen minutes, rinse with lukewarm water.
We make sure the fruit is really ripe, only it tastes sweet.
The best ones are fresh, which can also be eaten dried, especially in the winter. It contains quite a bit of tannin, which can make it have a tart taste, but this one gets lost when the fruit is fully ripe. It is great that they are practically not used for growing sprays. It's their season, it's just maturing now, so just treat them.
